title: Sans headline, serif text
content:
Please id the TWO fonts, sans and serif, in this sample

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416180953im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ztype_3523.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ztype.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416180953/http:/typophile.com/files/ztype.jpg) | 74.67 KB |
author: mkstudio

comments.content:
MS [Proxima Nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416180953/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/proxima-nova) (Extra/Condensed Alternate) and FF [Tisa](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416180953/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/tisa)

EDIT  
Hint: as usual when it happens to be an online piece of text, always link to the original [web page](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416180953/http:/www.houseandgarden.co.uk/food/breakfast-club/liberty-london-girl-cookbook-sasha-wilkins-recipes) and if you like to get an immediate answer, quoting R. from this [post](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416180953/http:/typophile.com/node/117175#comment-580410)

> Here’s one handy thing to know: If you want to identify a webfont, you can select the text that uses it, right-click on your selection and then select ‘Inspect Element’ from the context menu (in Firefox and Chrome). The font name will be shown on the right-hand side in the panel at the bottom of the screen. You might want to click on the tab ‘Fonts’ in Firefox or ‘Computed’ in Chrome for a neater overview.

Other handy options: Chrome [WhatFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416180953/http:/chengyinliu.com/whatfont.html) app by Chengyin Liu and [Fontface Ninja](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416180953/http:/fontface.ninja/)

The serif typeface appears to be Tisa:  
 [https://www.fontshop.com/families/ff-tisa](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416180953/https:/www.fontshop.com/families/ff-tisa "https://www.fontshop.com/families/ff-tisa")

Proxima Nova Semibold Extra Condensed appears to be the sans serif (pull quote) and Condensed Bold (question):  
 [https://www.fontshop.com/families/proxima-nova](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416180953/https:/www.fontshop.com/families/proxima-nova "https://www.fontshop.com/families/proxima-nova")

Thank you VERY much!!!  
And appreciate the hint.  
Happy New Year.
